topics.title: Amplifier Performance
topics.description: The analyst tests the amplifier's performance, discussing its output power and distortion.
evidence_quotes: Now we're putting out 2.27 volts so 2.27 volts RMS
It starts clipping because it shifted the output a little bit

topics.title: Board Quality
topics.description: The analyst discusses how soldering a board directly instead of using a socket board improves the amplifier's performance.
evidence_quotes: I actually soldered up a board instead of using a socket board

topics.title: Capacitor Effect
topics.description: The analyst shows how using the capacitor from the inverting input to ground affects the amplifier's output and reduces clipping.
evidence_quotes: I have that capacitor from inverting input to ground rather than shorting it
